text: To sleep well tonight and make I get paid for this, this video is sponsored by KurtzPel
a very dynamic and nervous cel-shading multiplayer game
which gives it this anime style to please the otakus
KurtzPel has this very deep character creation system, as well as for the hairstyle as for the size of your boobs...
and your ass' mass
and because I can tell everyone's gonna make a woman
know you can also manage your boob bounce
"a revolution"
you want bigger arguments ? I mean... better arguments....
then learn that the game is free, a very good price, in which you can fight against bosses in coop, or against players
go through the description, create your character, and fight !
Hi everyone, and welcome to the most subjective test ever on... Mordhau !
this test will be shorter than usual, and with good reason, it's summer !
I wouldn't want you to miss out on a nap under the sun's light !
in every case, if you're here to laugh your ass off...
or to see if mordhau is a shitty game...
you're in the right place ! But, what is Mordhau ?
a sausage ? Mordhau's sausage ? (you might have trouble understanding this joke, and that's normal if you're an English speaker)
nope asshole
it's a Slovak game, developed by Triterion
proving once again that Easter European countries know how to make medieval games
it has partially been funded via crowdfunding in 2017, gaining a bit less than 300 000$
out on April 29, 2019, Mordhau was sold like wildfire
200 000 copies in less than a week, and 500 000 copies in less than 10 days after lauch
since, the devs sleep in sheets woven into bundles of banknotes, and most of them have fallen into whores, alcohol and drugs
oh no nevermind, that's what I would do
let's talk about the game ! First you'll have to make one's arms
you'll have to follow the advice on an instructor who tells you you are completly safe
I have to say, this made me smile, and that's a good thing in a boring part such as tutorials
followed by him teaching how to use melee weapons
which grants you access to a gameplay as deep as Anissa Kate's décolleté
and as skillful as Manuel Ferrara
"Manuel Ferrara, you're a virgin..." *fake laugh* "Issou !"
to master your cudgel
because, hold on to your hats, you can attack from every angle, depending on your mouse's movements
you can attack vertically, useful for hammers, or in friendly crowded areas
so you avoid harming them with a horizontal attack
you can parry attacks, with the right timing please, because you need to keep in mind the whereabouts of your ennemy with the whereabouts of his weapon, and his angle of attack
which makes the attack faster or slower, adding up to the fact you can fake attacks
and you can also strike back after a parry
that's if your weapon is in the right place and you succeed in placing your counter attack in the very short time that is given
you can also thrust, to reach into small areas, or simply tease someone's ass with a spear
you also have secondary attacks with your weapons, like hitting with your handle, using it with two hands
LIKE MY DICK !
or even throw it at your enemy's face
and you obviously have a kick to falter your enemies with shields
but more importantly to mess with friendlies in your way
you can also piss off allies on balistas or catapults
but don't do it, that's not nice at all to hit friends, just to mess with them after all, it's useless !
and know that, except for the kick, all of the above can be done with your mouse
then the game teaches us to use a bow and arrow, fight on horseback, destroy and repair doors
subscribe, shoot a catapult, flush the toilet, that's all folks !
now that you're a master, you can now create your character !
I'm so happy! I can't wait to create an inclusive character to show my gender expression
WHAT !
watsis ?!
only white people are available!
only men are available!
where are blue and pink hairstyles !
this is really oppressive, I can't wait for an article from Numerama
especially because there women at that time, I remember that like it was yesterday !
they used to make yogurts that they ate right after finishing them!
but I have to say, they didn't fight that much
that was a job for alpha males, and that is why I created my first character...
Sir Hymenbreaker
So actually, THE CRANE IS MY DICK
in fact, the only thing I was breaking was my friends' eardrums with my luth
because yes, you can play the luth. It's useless, but you can play the luth !
and thanks to a software made for the game, you can play whatever you want !
who never dreamt of going into a battlefield with Deathpacito playing in the background ?
it makes for very confusing sequences. And players don't play the luth to earn points,
to grind, or to kill people,
no, it's just because it's fun and it makes everyone laugh, ffs!
Mordhau is finally the game where you actually play, where you laugh
which doesn't exclude at all the technical aspect of the game, because when you see two very experienced players crossing blades, it makes for a wonderful spectacle
but let's come back to the luth
when you play the luth, everyone respects you, there's nothing to say about it, even for the enemies
even when you've done something wrong in your software, everyone comes to say, "what the fuck are you playing asshole ?"
you can even troll the players you kill by playing a little piece of funeral music
whatever happens, a luth player is useless, and essential
your team will always come to save your butt
and by doing so, lead you to victory
but calm down,  you can experience the same situations without the luth...
the game has a very smart community if you forget people like me
and fair play is... here at least
it's very common for players to duel in the middle of the battlefield without other players interrupting
it deserves the name "For Honor" a lot more than Ubisoft's game
However, sometimes shit happens
but at the end, it's to laugh, seeing how dumb it is
oh and let's not forget about your gear !
you have a number of points for your armor, weapons, accessories and skills
you unlock weapons and cosmetics with gold,
gold that is earned easily
so when you land on the battlefront, you'll have as many possibilities than the others to be a proud knight
like Sauron on the battlefield
or a shitty peasant straight outta a background character in Game of Thrones
you know the show that is only good when Daenerys has her boobs o... *biiiiiiiip*
you also have a BR mode, which I'm not a big fan of
and I'm not the only, players tend to stay away from this mode
you can go up to 64 players, but having more than 25 players is an achievement in its own right
we can say it's a community with taste
as you may have understood, this game is as fun as it is skill-based, no P2W, no lootboxes, no confusion...
you buy the game, you have access to everything, the consumer is respected, and it repays him well
which makes me feel only East Europe understood this
after all, who would speak against the creators of Kingdom Come: Deliverance, The Witcher 3, and now Mordhau ?
maybe the video game's future is with our neighboors?
where the balance between the content's quality and the creators' image
will make others stop, those who flood us with DLCs, add-ons
season pass, battle pass, Honduras, your mass, and Jean Calas. Now, it's the press point !
we're starting with JeuxVideo.com, and their 16/20
I don't have a lot to say about the pros and cons
but their resumé says
"Never (and once again, the "a" is missing) battlefield has been this realistic than in Mordhau"
let me doubt, I'm not sure it went like that during that time...
"Never (and once again, the "a" is missing)  battlefield has been this realistic than in Mordhau"
that's not really what I read in history books
Now GameKult, and they gave it a...
a buck
I'd rather give it a web hobo
"humm, thanks for the donation, sheshounet
don't thank me, it wasn't hard to choose between you or GameKult
now Gameblog, and they gave it a 9
I'll point out the "community a bit toxic, for now (no ban or kick system)
yep, and if you were real journalists, you'll take 3 seconds of your life to check on the internet
you know, the thing you put your amateur crap on
let me reassure you, you can dispose of toxic players
trust a veteran on this
understand me, there's always someone on the catapult I wanna use
I'll also point out "some weapons need tweaking"
you're a game tester or a game designer? Stay in your place, you mycosis
ok, it's time to rate it !
I don't have anything else to say on Mordhau, except that women are to be included
so we're only hoping for one little thing,
that the character customization will be as deep as in KurtzPel
OUT OF 20 !
don't hesitate to watch my other videos if you liked this one,
to share, like and subscribe.
The bell, I don't care, because I will finally be on vacation for a few weeks !
